name: Simple Shooter Demo by AlienBrother
description:
This is the last game I made in the scope of the course I took. It is a simple shooter game demo. You have to eliminate all to enemies in the base in order to win.  You have limited ammo so used wisely. 

Controls

WASD to move.

LeftMouseButton to shoot.

Space to jump.

Press R to restart the level anytime you wish.

Press P to pause to game.
